mainBoard.name: Fiend Hunter

rulings.text: If Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield before its first ability has resolved, its second ability will trigger and do nothing. Then its first ability will resolve and exile the target creature indefinitely. This is different from abilities on other cards that exile a permanent “until” something happens.

Once the exiled creature returns, it’s considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creature will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist.
If a token is exiled this way, it won’t return to the battlefield.

In a multiplayer game, if you lose the game, the creature exiled with Fiend Hunter remains exiled indefinitely. This is also different from abilities on other cards that exile a permanent “until” something happens.

mainBoard.text:
When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature.
When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainBoard.name: Oblivion Ring

rulings.text: If Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield before its first ability has resolved, its second ability will trigger and do nothing. Then its first ability will resolve and exile the targeted nonland permanent forever.

If there are no nonland permanents on the battlefield other than an Oblivion Ring, and the card it exiled was another Oblivion Ring, casting a third Oblivion Ring will result in an involuntary infinite loop that will end the game in a draw (unless someone chooses to break it by putting another nonland permanent onto the battlefield or destroying one of the Oblivion Rings, for example).

If the exiled card is an Aura, that card’s owner chooses what it will enchant as it comes back onto the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn’t target anything, but the Aura’s enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can’t legally be attached to anything, it remains exiled forever.

Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled permanent will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist.

mainBoard.text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

foreignData.name: Guarda-Relíquias Leonino
foreignData.text:
Quando Guarda-Relíquias Leonino entra no campo de batalha, você pode exilar o artefato ou o encantamento alvo.
Quando Guarda-Relíquias Leonino deixar o campo de batalha, devolva o card exilado ao campo de batalha sob o controle de seu dono.

foreignData.name: Леонинский Хранитель Реликвий
foreignData.text:
Когда Леонинский Хранитель Реликвий выходит на поле битвы, вы можете изгнать целевой артефакт или чары.
Когда Леонинский Хранитель Реликвий покидает поле битвы, верните ту изгнанную карту на поле битвы под контролем ее владельца.

foreignData.name: 狮族遗宝护卫
foreignData.text:
当狮族遗宝护卫进战场时，你可以放逐目标神器或结界。
当狮族遗宝护卫离开战场时，将所放逐的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

foreignData.name: 獅族遺寶護衛
foreignData.text:
當獅族遺寶護衛進戰場時，你可以放逐目標神器或結界。
當獅族遺寶護衛離開戰場時，將所放逐的牌在其擁有者的操控下移回戰場。

sideBoard.name: Leonin Relic-Warder

rulings.text: If Leonin Relic-Warder leaves the battlefield before its first ability has resolved, its second ability will trigger and when it resolves, do nothing. Then its first ability will resolve and exile the targeted artifact or enchantment with no way to return it to the battlefield.

sideBoard.text:
When Leonin Relic-Warder enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment.
When Leonin Relic-Warder leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

sideBoard.flavorText: "By the law of Avacyn, the following thoughts, words, and deeds are henceforth disallowed."

foreignData.flavorText: „Im Namen von Avacyn sind die folgenden Gedanken, Worte und Taten ab sofort nicht mehr erlaubt."
foreignData.name: Nimmermehr
foreignData.text:
Sowie Nimmermehr ins Spiel kommt, benenne eine Karte, die kein Land ist.
Die genannte Karte kann nicht gewirkt werden.

foreignData.flavorText: "Por la ley de Avacyn, los siguientes pensamientos, palabras y acciones quedan prohibidos."
foreignData.name: Nunca más
foreignData.text:
En cuanto Nunca más entre al campo de batalla, nombra una carta que no sea tierra.
La carta nombrada no puede lanzarse.

foreignData.flavorText: « Par décret de la loi d'Avacyn, les pensées, les mots et les actes suivants sont désormais interdits. »
foreignData.name: Jamais plus !
foreignData.text:
Au moment où Jamais plus ! arrive sur le champ de bataille, nommez une carte non-terrain.
La carte nommée ne peut pas être lancée.

foreignData.flavorText: "Per la legge di Avacyn, i seguenti pensieri, parole e azioni d'ora in poi non saranno più ammessi."
foreignData.name: Mai Più
foreignData.text:
Mentre Mai Più entra nel campo di battaglia, nomina una carta non terra.
La carta nominata non può essere lanciata.

foreignData.flavorText: 「アヴァシンの法の下に、以下の思想、発言、行動はこれ以降許されぬ。」
foreignData.name: 金輪際
foreignData.text:
金輪際が戦場に出るに際し、土地でないカード名を１つ指定する。
指定されたカードは唱えられない。

foreignData.flavorText: "아바신의 율법에 따라 다음과 같은 사상과 언행을 이 시간 이후로 불허하노라."
foreignData.name: 금기령
foreignData.text: 금기령이 전장에 들어올 시, 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 호명한다.호명된 카드는 발동될 수 없다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Pela lei de Avacyn, os pensamentos, palavras e ações seguintes estão proibidos daqui em diante."
foreignData.name: Nunca Mais
foreignData.text:
Conforme Nunca Mais entra no campo de batalha, nomeie um card que não seja um terreno.
O card nomeado não pode ser conjurado.

foreignData.flavorText: «По закону Авацины следующие мысли, слова и деяния впредь не допускаются».
foreignData.name: Никогда Впредь
foreignData.text:
При выходе Никогда Впредь на поле битвы назовите не являющуюся землей карту.
Названная карта не может быть разыграна.

foreignData.flavorText: 「依照艾维欣的律法，下列的思绪，字句，以及信条从此将不被允许。」
foreignData.name: 永封咒
foreignData.text:
于永封咒进战场时，说出一个非地牌的名称。
不能施放该名称的牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 「依照艾維欣的律法，下列的思緒，字句，以及信條從此將不被允許。」
foreignData.name: 永封咒
foreignData.text:
於永封咒進戰場時，說出一個非地牌的名稱。
不能施放該名稱的牌。

sideBoard.name: Nevermore

rulings.text: No one can cast spells or activate abilities between the time a card is named and the time that Nevermore's ability starts to work.
Spells with the chosen name that somehow happen to already be on the stack when Nevermore enters the battlefield are not affected by Nevermore's ability.
Although the named card can't be cast, it can still be put onto the battlefield by a spell or ability (if it's a permanent card).
You can name either half of a split card, but not both. If you do so, that half (and both halves, if the split card has fuse) can't be cast. The other half is unaffected.
The named card can be cast again once Nevermore leaves the battlefield.
If you name one of the faces of a modal double-faced card, players may still play the face you didn't name. (Players can never cast the back face of a transforming double-faced card)

sideBoard.text:
As Nevermore enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

foreignData.name: Nihilistische Spruchbombe
foreignData.text:
{T}, opfere die Nihilistische Spruchbombe: Schicke alle Karten aus dem Friedhof eines Spielers deiner Wahl ins Exil.
Wenn die Nihilistische Spruchbombe aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, kannst du {B} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.name: Bombahechizo nihil
foreignData.text:
{T}, sacrificar la Bombahechizo nihil: Exilia todas las cartas del cementerio del jugador objetivo.
Cuando la Bombahechizo nihil vaya a un cementerio desde el campo de batalla puedes pagar {B}. Si lo haces, roba una carta.

foreignData.name: Bombe à sortilèges d'annihilation
foreignData.text:
{T}, sacrifiez la Bombe à sortilèges d'annihilation : Exilez toutes les cartes du cimetière du joueur ciblé.
Quand la Bombe à sortilèges d'annihilation est mise dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer {B}. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.

foreignData.name: Bombarcana Nichilista
foreignData.text:
{T}, Sacrifica la Bombarcana Nichilista: Esilia tutte le carte dal cimitero di un giocatore bersaglio.
Quando la Bombarcana Nichilista viene messa in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia, puoi pagare {B}. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.

foreignData.name: 虚無の呪文爆弾
foreignData.text:
{T}, 虚無の呪文爆弾を生け贄に捧げる：プレイヤー１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーの墓地にあるすべてのカードを追放する。
虚無の呪文爆弾が戦場からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、あなたは{B}を支払ってもよい。 そうした場合、カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.name: Magibomba Niilista
foreignData.text:
{T}, Sacrifique Magibomba Niilista: Exile todos os cards do cemitério do jogador alvo.
Quando Magibomba Niilista é colocado num cemitério vindo do campo de batalha, você pode pagar {B}. Se fizer isso, compre um card.

foreignData.name: Волшебная Бомба Нигилизма
foreignData.text:
{T}, пожертвуйте Волшебную Бомбу Нигилизма: изгоните все карты из кладбища целевого игрока.
Когда Волшебная Бомба Нигилизма попадает с поля битвы на кладбище, вы можете заплатить {B}. Если вы это делаете, возьмите карту.

foreignData.name: 返虚咒击弹
foreignData.text:
{T}，牺牲返虚咒击弹：放逐目标牌手坟墓场中的所有牌。
当返虚咒击弹从战场进入坟墓场时，你可以支付{B}。 若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

foreignData.name: 返虛咒擊彈
foreignData.text:
{T}，犧牲返虛咒擊彈：放逐目標玩家墳墓場中的所有牌。
當返虛咒擊彈從戰場進入墳墓場時，你可以支付{B}。 若你如此作，則抽一張牌。

sideBoard.name: Nihil Spellbomb

rulings.text: You may activate Nihil Spellbomb’s first ability targeting any player, even one whose graveyard has no cards in it.

sideBoard.text:
{T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile target player's graveyard.
When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

foreignData.name: Naht-Priesterin
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn eine andere Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazuerhalten.
Immer wenn eine Kreatur unter der Kontrolle eines Gegners ins Spiel kommt, kannst du diesen Spieler 1 Lebenspunkt verlieren lassen.

foreignData.name: Sacerdotisa suturadora
foreignData.text:
Siempre que otra criatura entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, puedes ganar 1 vida.
Siempre que una criatura entre al campo de batalla bajo el control de un oponente, puedes hacer que ese jugador pierda 1 vida.

foreignData.name: Prêtresse de suture
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois qu'une autre créature arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, vous pouvez gagner 1 point de vie.
À chaque fois qu'une créature arrive sur le champ de bataille sous le contrôle d'un adversaire, vous pouvez faire que ce joueur perde 1 point de vie.

foreignData.name: Sacerdotessa di Sutura
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, puoi guadagnare 1 punto vita.
Ogniqualvolta una creatura entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il controllo di un avversario, puoi far perdere 1 punto vita a quel giocatore.

foreignData.name: 縫合の僧侶
foreignData.text:
他のクリーチャーが１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたは１点のライフを得てもよい。
クリーチャーが１体いずれかの対戦相手のコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたは「そのプレイヤーは１点のライフを失う。」を選んでもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — クレリック

foreignData.name: Sacerdote da Sutura
foreignData.text:
Toda vez que outra criatura entra no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, você pode ganhar 1 ponto de vida.
Toda vez que uma criatura entra no campo de batalha sob o controle de um oponente, você pode fazer com que aquele jogador perca 1 ponto de vida.

foreignData.name: Жрица Сшивания
foreignData.text:
Каждый раз когда другое существо выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, вы можете получить 1 жизнь.
Каждый раз когда существо выходит на поле битвы под контролем оппонента, вы можете заставить того игрока потерять 1 жизнь.

foreignData.name: 缝组牧师
foreignData.text:
每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以获得1点生命。
每当一个生物在对手的操控下进战场时，你可以令该牌手失去1点生命。

foreignData.name: 縫組牧師
foreignData.text:
每當另一個生物在你的操控下進戰場時，你可以獲得1點生命。
每當一個生物在對手的操控下進戰場時，你可以令該玩家失去1點生命。

sideBoard.name: Suture Priest
sideBoard.text:
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 1 life.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.
